changelog: Fix a few more bugs I forgot to fix with spigot

Fix server stopping not working
Fix update checker
Implement URL Encoded advancement message

Fixed linking not being saved
Optimized code
Large discord integration rewrite adding new features and fixing long existing bugs

Fix a few issues
Add new custom command parameter
Fix default webhook name
Bump minimum Forge version to 40.1.0
Fix mentions in webhooks
Fix mentions in any non-chat message
Remove /discord stop and /discord restart ingame commands

Note that this is still beta

Moved DM commands to slash commands

Bug Fixes:
Fix advancement spam, mod now checks if advancement is complete
Fix several crashes if setup isn't done properly, showing error in log instead
Fix attachments and embeds
Fix advancements for 1.17.1

READ CURSEFORGE CHANGELOG BEFORE UPDATING!
Reworked config commands
Changed whitelisting to whitelist code
